moves.2. Nf3: ?! I've never seen this move. I think best was fxe5.
moves.3. Ng5: ? Not really the best place for it. I believe better was Nd4 or Ng1.
moves.3... d5: I had to guard my e4-pawn.
moves.5. Nh3 Bd6 6. Nf2: ?! Boy! He's just moving his knight and pawns!!
moves.6... Nf6 7. Nc3: Finally, he got another piece out!
moves.11. a3: I guess he thought I was going Nb4.
moves.17. b4: He has mostly moved pawns, so far.
moves.20... hxg4 21. Qc4 Nb6: Attacking his Queen. Duh, what else?! :P
moves.25... Bc7 26. Qc5 Qxc5 27. bxc5: I'm up four points, why not trade?
moves.27... Nd5 28. Be4 Nxc3 29. Rxc3: ? A blunder, as you will see....
moves.30. Kf1 Bxc3 31. Nxc3: Now I'm up six points. I'm in heaven....
moves.31... Kf7 32. Ke2: We need to get our kings in the game.
I believe he did that so he could move his Bishop.
moves.38. Nd5 Rxe4: !? I just wanted to see what would happen :D
moves.43. Ne3 Rb4 44. Nxg4 Rxe4: OK, I believe the endgame will be easy, now
moves.45. Kf3 Rxg4: ! I think that this is the quickest way to win.
moves.46. Kxg4 Ke7 47. Kf3 Kd6: All I got to do is get my king to e5 and I win easily.
moves.50. Kc3 c4 51. Kb4: ?? Best was to go Kc2 but it doesn't make no difference to the outcome of the game.
moves.52. Kb5 c3 53. Kc6 c2 54. Kd6 c1=Q: I would like a queen, thank you.
moves.59... Kf4: ?? But what do I do???!! I didn't not do it!
moves.60. Kg6 Kxg4: He resigned -- After Kh6 Kxf5 and Kh5 Qh7 mate. I hope that you liked it? Please leave a comment and rate it on the star system, thanks.
